Actions.Name: Agonize
Actions.Hit: [D] and character must save or become slowed.
Actions.Effects: The Wheel dashes up to 8 spaces before this attack. It deals additional damage equal to how far it traveled before it attacked.

Actions.Name: Spit Fire
Actions.AreaEffect: 2 damage and characters are burning. Burning characters instead take [D]+2.

Actions.Name: Spin Out
Actions.Description: Adjacent foes must save or become blinded and burning. Burning foes fail the save.

Actions.Name: Exfoliate
Actions.Description: Repeat the following effect three times.
Actions.Effects: An adjacent foe must save or take [D]+[fray], or [fray] damage on a failed save. Slow characters fail the save.
